meanings.definition: Resembling a root in appearance or function.
meanings.sent1: The plant had rootlike structures extending deep into the soil.
meanings.sent2: The tree's branches spread out in a rootlike pattern.
meanings.sent3: The rootlike vines seemed to be searching for hidden treasure underground.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as rootlike as the strongest tree in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The roots of the old oak tree were so rootlike that they cracked the pavement.
